name: Wow Labz
tagline: World Class Products for the Startup age
description:
"We are 23 designers, developers and growth hackers. We are small, ambitious and pretty hard working."
We are ranked among the top mobile app developers in India by Clutch, GoodFirms and Silicon India.
Our founders have created multiple social initiatives like Headstart Network Foundation, Lean Startup Machine India, House of Genius Bangalore and Design Day (formerly Bangalore Designers) and are recognised as leaders in the areas of entrepreneurship, design and lean methodologies. Our engineers and designers are incredibly talented. 
Some non standard things that are a part of every product we develop :-
Analyitcs.
Non spammy system emails.
Keeping track of app crashes and proactively fixing them.
Greater speed by minimising images.
Better user acquisition by differed deep linking.
The most effective user acquisition strategy is through contextual search results.
Personal communication with initial set of users.
We have a very strong work ethic.
80% of our projects have been completed on or before time
40% of our customers have offered us a bonus, co-founder position, or equity without us asking.
100% of the work we have done has been in budget.
100% of our leads come as referrals from past clients or people we have worked with.
At Wow, we typically build 4 sophisticated consumer Internet and Mobile products every year. The company also invests in some of the startups we have helped build. Our management team sits on the board of 5 technology startups based out of Bangalore, Brisbane (Australia) and San Francisco.
